divs: Sighting Detailswas at my brothers house he had called me over he said that the lights were out in the sky, so i wemt over there and there where lights with red green or blue and white lights flashing from the north, east, west, and south. So my brother got out his big flashlight and flashed it off and on the object to the east went crazy you could see all the lights flicker has if it was going crazy.my sister-in-law and i was getting a little scared cause the light would move more light when my brother fladed his ligths off and on i wish somone would take us seriously we have seen flashing lights in the skys that dont move until they are ready.something is going on in this area my brother and sister-in -law and neice and me have been checking these lights out for over a month they are always to the north,south.eastm and west. i wish someone would investigate into the lights we even have managed to get a few pictures
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Decatur
There were 2 other sightings in Decatur on or around September 27th 2008
Summary: disc shaped object to the east flashing red, blue green and white lights
